metadata.title: CVE-2022-2501 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper access control issue in GitLab EE affecting all versions from12.0 prior to 15.0.5, 15.1 prior to 15.1.4, and 15.2 prior to 15.2.1 allowsan attacker to bypass IP allow-listing and download artifacts. This attackonly bypasses IP allow-listing, proper permissions are still required.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
